alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:30PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Spalding County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Fayette County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Henry County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Clayton County in north central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Inman, or near Fayetteville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Griffin, McDonough, Fayetteville, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Brooks, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Blacksville, Walker Mill, Inman, Luella, Jw Smith Reservoir, Flippen, Highland Mills, Towalaga, Experiment, and Birdie. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
